name: Hunter Wolf - Magic Animal Sim
description:
Become a legendary magic wolf roaming the fantasy lands in search of… revenge! Defeat everything on your way, ruin magical scrolls, fight with stunning hydras, mushrooms, lizards and maybe even dragons – ‘cause why not? DownloadHunter Wolf - Magic Animal Sim game and dip into real adventures atmosphere!

Hunter Wolf - Magic Animal Sim features:
• Fantastic wolf as the main hero
• Chance to summon brothers for help
• Interesting rivals and enemies
• Great battling contests and quests
• Opportunity to ruin everything around
• Many unlockable magic skins
• Easy controls and addictive gameplay
• Wonderful 3D atmosphere

Download this stunning Hunter Wolf - Magic Animal Sim game – don’t lose your chance to dip into the real fantasy atmosphere!
